title: Chilled tomato bisque
description: Based on a gazpacho but smooth instead of chunky this soup is wonderfully refreshing on a hot summer's day.
ingredients: 1 slice white country bread, crusts removed and broken into large crumbs
½ garlic clove, peeled and finely chopped
½ red chili, seeded and finely diced
½ red pepper, roasted or grilled, peeled, seeded and diced
¼ large cucumber, peeled, seeded and roughly diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
frozen olive oil cubes (place olive oil in ice cube moulds and freeze)
